templates.name: Welcome New Devotee
templates.subject: 🙏 Welcome to {{temple_name}} - Your Spiritual Journey Begins
templates.body:
Namaste {{devotee_name}},

We are delighted to welcome you to our {{temple_name}} family! 🕉️

Your registration has been successfully completed, and you are now part of our spiritual community. We look forward to serving you in your devotional journey.

📱 What's Next:
• Complete your profile to receive personalized recommendations
• Browse our upcoming sevas and events
• Connect with our community of devotees

For any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.

With divine blessings,
{{temple_name}} Management Team

📧 Email: {{temple_email}}
📞 Phone: {{temple_phone}}

Birthday Wishes
templates.body:
🎂 Happy Birthday {{devotee_name}}! 🎉

On this special day, may the divine shower you with abundant blessings, good health, prosperity, and spiritual growth.

🙏 Special Birthday Seva:
We've arranged a special birthday seva for you. Please visit the temple at your convenience to receive divine blessings.

🎁 Birthday Blessing:
"May your path be filled with devotion, your heart with peace, and your life with joy."

Celebrate your special day with us!

With warm wishes,
{{temple_name}} Family 🕉️

📞 {{temple_phone}}
